altTitles.en: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Gaiden
Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun - Kalego Side Story

description.en: A special, two-part side story manga set in the world of *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun*, focusing on Naberius Kalego during his days as a student of Babyls Demon School.

An ordinary corporate slave, Ding Xueyang, has a secret - he has a special ability! But his special ability has a flaw; if he is seen using it, the special ability will be randomized to a new one.

For over twenty years, in order to keep this secret, Ding Xueyang has been living very cautiously. He didn't have a significant other, didn't make any friends, and didn't even keep a pet.

Until one day, a homeless person came across his secret, and from then on Ding Xueyang has plunged into an abyss of suffering!

description.en:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around… So, she makes a choice…?
description.ja:
堅物で真面目な警察官だと周りから尊敬されている一式警部は、最近どうも仕事がうまくいかないご様子。
その原因は一緒に仕事をしている探偵・六反田がいる時にばかり起こってしまう…。
とあることから悩みの原因が判明した彼女は、問題を解決すべく六反田探偵と擬似カップルとして付き合うことになったが…？
恋を知らない乙女が擬似カップルとしてお付き合いに大挑戦な、ラブコメディ！

※2話目まで旧タイトル「鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい」表記となります。
description.pt-br:
Uma donzela que não sabe o que é o amor, experimenta o namoro como um pseudo-casal!

A inspectora Rinna, que é respeitada por todos como uma agente policial trabalhadora e séria, parece estar a ter problemas com o seu trabalho ultimamente. A razão para isto é porque ela perde o foco. Isto só acontece quando Meishi, o detective com quem ela trabalha, está por perto. Então, ela faz uma escolha…?

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

description.ar:
بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طردت من عائلة آرنو بسبب الترف والفساد . بعد ان تجولت في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش تم اقتيادها إلى دير رث . وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة . الشريرة التي لا تعرف الشرف . كانت هذه بيانكا . هي الحياة قبل عودة " هل هذا حقيقي ؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي ؟ " إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة . هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية ... كل هذا حقيقيا . حقا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى ... ! | سأقوم بأعمال تجارية . الزواج هو أيضا عمل . سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرا جيدا للأعمال التجارية . سيحمي أيضا . لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب الفيكونت اللعين . طفله هذا مهري " للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة . " " كم هو مهر زفافنا ؟ " " 400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة ... كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين . إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك ؟ " وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري .

---
كانت بيانكا دي بلانش زوجة زكاري دي أرنو ، ولكن بعد وفاته ، طُردت من عائلة أرنو بسبب الترف والفساد.
 بعد أن لم تتجول في أي مكان حتى سقوط والدها ، عائلة بلانش ، تم اقتيادها إلى دير رثّ.
 وفي النهاية ماتت في النهاية على الأرضية الحجرية الباردة.
 الشرير الذي لا يعرف الشرف. كانت هذه هي الحياة قبل عودة بيانكا.

===
 “هل هذا حقيقي؟ هل عدت إلى الماضي؟ ”
 إنه ليس حلما أو هلوسة. هذا الجوع والتعب والحيوية … كل هذا كان حقيقيًا. حقًا ، إذا كان الأمر كذلك ، إذا أعطاني الله فرصة ثمينة أخرى …!

 سأقوم بأعمال تجارية. الزواج هو أيضا عمل.

 سيكون ابن زكاري مصدرًا جيدًا للأعمال التجارية. سيحمي طفله مهرتي أيضًا. لن يتم نزع قلعة بلانش ولا مقاطعة أرنو بسبب هذا الفيكونت اللعين.

 “للقيام بذلك ، يجب أن أنجب طفل زكاري ، زوجي من حياتي السابقة.”

 “كم هو مهر زفافنا؟”

 “400 عجول ، 900 خنزير ، 100 سلطانية فضية ، 300 حرير ، صندوقان من المجوهرات ، وجزء من التركة … كان هذا يعادل ميزانية عائلة أرنو لمدة عامين. ”

 “إذن ، ألا يجب أن أدفع مقابل ذلك؟”

 وسواء أغريته أو أقنعته ، لا بد لي من الزواج من زكاري.

---

description.cs:
Bianca de Arno bola bezohľadná grófka v Sevranskom kráľovstve, neslávne známa ako zlá a sebecká manželka. Zatiaľ čo jej manžel, gróf Zachar de Arno, statočne riskoval život na bojisku, ona sedela doma a míňala jeho peniaze. Až v posledný deň si Bianka uvedomila chybu svojich činov. Pred smrťou sa modlí za druhú šancu a prebudí sa vo svojom 19-ročnom tele. Vďaka druhej šanci začne Bianca vidieť všetko v novom svetle... počnúc svojím manželom.

description.en:
Bianca de Arno was a ruthless countess in the Kingdom of Sevran, infamous for being a wicked and selfish wife. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasn’t until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.

---
Bianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Bianca’s life before she went back in time.

===
“Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?”

This was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her… This was all real. If this was indeed reality… If God truly gave her one more precious chance…!

‘I’m going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zachary’s child will be the perfect source of financial support. I’m sure my dowry will remain safe too. I won’t have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.’

Then whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zachary’s child.

“How much was my dowry exactly?”

“400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory… Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.”

“Don’t you think you should compensate for that?”

---

description.es:
Blanca de Blanchefort. Una mujer que era la esposa de Zachary de Arno, pero que fue expulsada de la familia Arno después de su muerte por motivos de lujo, inmoralidad y lascivia. Una mujer que estuvo a punto de ser expulsada a un monasterio en la destartalada frontera tras vagar sin rumbo debido a la caída de su familia paterna, la familia Blanchefort. Y al final, una mujer que finalmente murió en el frío suelo de piedra. Una mujer sin honor. Esa era la vida antes del regreso de Bianca. *** “¿Es esto real? ¿De verdad he vuelto al pasado? “No es un sueño ni una alucinación. Esta hambre, cansancio, viveza… Todo es real.” “Dios me ha dado otra valiosa oportunidad…!” El matrimonio es un negocio después de todo. Tener un hijo de Zachary será una buena fuente de negocios. Mantendré mi dote. El maldito vizconde no se llevará el territorio de Blanchefort y el territorio de Arno. “Debo tener un hijo con mi esposo, Zachary.” “¿No debería valer la pena?” O seducirlo o persuadirlo… Esa es la cuestión.

---

description.fr:
Quand le Comte d'Arno meurt sur le champ de bataille, il laisse derrière lui sa femme, Bianca d'Arno. Veuve à un si jeune âge et sans héritier, elle est contrainte de vivre dans la pauvreté. Mais un jour, alors qu'elle mourait de faim, elle se réveille dans le passé. Sans aucun doute, Bianca sait ce qu'il lui reste à faire pour survivre: prendre son indépendance financière avant la mort du comte! Mais la tâche s'annonce difficile dans une société où la femme n'a pas son mot à dire...

---

description.id:
Bianca de Arno, istri Zachary de Arno, adalah istri jahat yang suka berfoya-foya. Setelah suaminya mati, Ia berakhir dibuang dan hidup menderita. Di ambang kematiannya, Bianca kembali ke saat ia berumur 18 tahun. Tapi sama seperti masa lalu, tidak ada seorang pun di county Arno yang menyukai dirinya. Maka itu, Bianca membutuhkan anak yang bisa menjadi penerus yang bisa mengubah posisinya yang dikucilkan. Ia pun bertekad untuk menjalankan tugasnya sebagai istri dan melahirkan penerus count Arno.

---
Bianca de Blanche, FL kita, dibuang oleh keluarga Arno setelah kematian mantan suaminya, Zakari de Arno. Karena keluarganya juga jatuh, akhirnya dia terpaksa tinggal di biara hingga akhir hidupnya. Dan seperti biasa... dia kembali ke masa lalu. Karena Bianca tidak mau mengulang hal yang sama, dia mengajukan pernikahan kontrak dengan mantan suaminya dulu. Dia berpikir, kalau dia punya anak dari Zakari, dia gak akan dibuang lagi oleh keluarga suaminya dan bisa hidup tenang. Apa kehidupan pernikahan kontrak ini akan berjalan mulus seperti yang dia harapkan?

---

description.it:
Bianca de Blanche era la moglie di Zachary de Arno, ma dopo la sua morte fu espulsa dalla famiglia Arno a causa del suo comportamento autoindulgente, frivolo e immorale. Dopo aver vagato inesorabile verso la caduta e la rovina della sua famiglia, la famiglia Blanche, viene portata in uno squallido monastero di periferia. E alla fine... morì sul freddo pavimento di pietra. Una cattiva senza onore: quella era la vita di Bianca prima di tornare indietro nel tempo.

贅沢な悪妻、ビアンカ・ド・アルノー。皆に捨てられて死んでいったその時、ビアンカは奇跡的に18歳に回帰する。絶縁状態にある実家、アルノー伯爵領の誰もが私のことを好きではなかった。孤立した私の立場を固めるには跡継ぎが必要… 。「私、貴方の子供を産む準備ができました」「…その話は今度にしよう」「私たちの結婚はおいくらだったでしょうか?値段相応に振舞おうと思うのです。」

description.ko:
비앙카 드 블랑쉐포르.

자카리 드 아르노의 아내였지만 그의 사후, 사치와 배덕함, 그리고 음탕함을 명분으로 아르노가(家)에서 내쳐진 여자. 친가인 블랑쉐포르가(家)의 몰락으로 오갈 데 없이 방황한 끝에 초라한 변방의 수도원으로 쫓겨나다시피 한 여자. 그리고 그 끝에 결국 차가운 돌바닥 위에서 죽게 된 여자.

명예를 모르는 악녀.

그것이 바로 비앙카의 회귀 전 생이었다.

===

“이게 현실이라고? 정말, 과거로 돌아온 거란 말이야?”

꿈도, 환각도 아니다. 이 배고픔은, 피로는, 생생함은….
이 모든 것은 현실이었다.

정말, 정말 그렇다면. 신이 나에게 다시 한 번의 값진 기회를 주신 거라면…!

‘나는 장사를 하는 거야. 결혼도 결국 장사니까. 자카리의 아이는 좋은 장사 밑천이 되어 줄 거야. 내 지참금도 지켜 주겠지. 블랑쉐포르 영지도, 아르노 영지도 그 빌어먹을 자작에게 빼앗기지 않게 될 거야.’

그러려면 그녀의 남편, 자카리의 아이를 낳아야 한다.

“우리의 결혼은 얼마짜리 결혼이었죠?”
“송아지 400마리, 돼지 900마리, 은그릇 100개, 비단 300필, 보석 두 궤짝, 그리고 영지 일부분…. 아르노가의 이 년 치 예산 만큼이었지.”
“그 값은 해야 하지 않겠어요?”

그를 유혹해서든, 설득해서든.

Бьянка де Бланшфор. Жена Захари де Арно, изгнанная из семьи мужа после его гибели. Ей больше некуда было идти, семья Бланшфор разорилась и была отправлена в монастырь на границе королевства. description.pt-br:
Bianca de Blanche era a esposa de Zachary de Arno, mas após sua morte, ela foi expulsa da família Arno por luxo e imoralidade.

Depois de vagar sem propósito após a queda de seu pai e da família Blanche, ela é levada para um monastério de periferia.

E no final, ela acabou morrendo no chão de pedra fria.

Uma vilã que não conhece a honra. Essa era sua vida antes do retorno de Bianca.

===

“Isto é real? Eu voltei ao passado?”

Não é um sonho ou uma alucinação. Essa fome, fadiga, vivacidade… Tudo isso era real. Realmente, se sim, se Deus me desse mais uma oportunidade preciosa…!

‘Vou fazer negócios. O casamento também é um negócio.’

O filho de Zachary será uma boa fonte de negócios. O filho dele também protegerá meu dote. Nem a fortaleza Blanche, nem a província de Arno serão levadas por aquele maldito visconde.

‘Para fazer isso, tenho que dar à luz o filho de Zachary, meu marido da minha vida anterior.’

“Quanto é o nosso dote de casamento?”

“400 bezerros, 900 porcos, 100 tigelas de prata, 300 sedas, dois baús de joias e uma parte da propriedade… Isso era tanto quanto o orçamento de dois anos da família Arno. “

“Então, eu não deveria ter que pagar por isso?”

Quer eu o tente ou o convença, tenho que ficar com Zachary.

During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…

Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.

description.ja:
**出会ってひと突きで絶頂除霊！@comic**

それは突いた相手を生者死者問わず強制的に絶頂させ、もののついでみたいに悪霊怪異を昇天させるろくでもない猥褻能力。

各地に悪霊や怪異が出没し、退魔師という職業が存在するこの世界。
未来ある少年少女たちの中から、才能のあるものは「退魔学園」にて修行を積む。

絶頂除霊などという、呪われた能力をその身に宿す少年・古屋晴久は、その学園の中でもおちこぼれだ。
なにせ、能力を使ったら、色々な意味で(社会的に)死ぬ……。
だが、晴久は出会ってしまった。
同じような呪いの眼——淫魔眼を持つ少女・宗谷美咲に。
人の秘密をたやすく暴く、恐怖の瞳術の使い手に。

かくして(半ば強制的に)退魔師史上最低最悪、されどいつしか最強と呼ばれる退魔師たちの伝説が幕を開ける。
初めてのまともなお仕事は、怪異・乳避け女との大活劇。

——んほおおおおおおおおおおおおおおおっ!?

今宵も、街には嬌声が響き渡る。
それは紛れもなく、昇天の証明。

ポンコツ退魔師たちが卑猥な能力で大活躍？
エロは世界を救う？
ちょっぴりエッチな退魔活劇!!

---

**Deatte hito tsuki de zetchō jorei! @ Comic**

Sore wa tsuita aite o seija shisha towazu kyōsei-teki ni zetchō sa se,-mono no tsuide mitai ni akuryō kaii o shōten sa seru ro kude mo nai waisetsu nōryoku. 

Kakuchi ni akuryō ya kaii ga shutsubotsu shi, taimashi to iu shokugyō ga sonzai suru kono sekai. Mirai aru shōnen shōjo-tachi no naka kara, sainō no aru mono wa `taima gakuen' nite shugyō o tsumu. 

Zetchō jorei nado to iu, norowareta nōryoku o sono mi ni yadosu shōnen Furuya Haruhisa wa, sono gakuen no naka demo ochikoboreda. Nanise, nōryoku o tsukattara, iroirona imi de (shakai-teki ni) shinu…….Daga, Haruhisa wa deatte shimatta. Onajiyōna noroi no me —— inma me o motsu shōjo Souya Misaki ni. Hito no himitsu o tayasuku abaku, kyōfu no hitomi-jutsu no tsukaite ni. 

Kakushite (nakaba kyōsei-teki ni) taimashi shijō saitei saiaku, saredo itsushika saikyō to yoba reru taimashi-tachi no densetsu ga maku o akeru. Hajimete no matomona oshigoto wa, kaii chichi sake on'na to no dai katsugeki. 

_—— N hō ōo ōo ōo ōo ō ~tsu!?_

Koyoi mo,-gai ni wa kyōsei ga hibiki wataru. Sore wa magire mo naku, shōten no shōmei. 

Ponkotsu taimashi-tachi ga hiwaina nōryoku de dai katsuyaku? Ero wa sekai o sukuu?

Choppirietchina taima katsugeki! !

description.en:
My name is Asagi Kamiyashiro. My last memories of my old life were a night like every other at my part-time job up until an unnamed assailant mercilessly stabbed me. As I was fading into an empty void losing my consciousness, I had an explosive realization of how much I regretted in this life. I never honestly used my degree, I never had a girlfriend, and I lived a pretty quiet life. Day in and day out I worked like I was on clockwork. As the thought of regrets filled my mind, I told myself, if I was reincarnated I would make use of that life to its fullest. That's when a disembodied voice spoke.  
 
_"The desire to be reincarnated confirmed. Granting Unique Skillset: Jack Of all Trades, Master of None"_ 
 
At first, I considered those words to be insulting… But now… Not so much… My story begins in the middle of a foggy grass hill.

---
**Note:** The chapter *numbering* in the Volumes are one ahead of the Magazine/Digital due to treating the split 2.1 & 2.2 as separate chapters (2 & 3)
description.id: Aku, Asagi Kamiyashiro, diserang oleh perampok saat bekerja paruh waktu. Ketika aku bangun, saya dipindahkan ke dunia lain yang dihuni oleh monster. Aku tidak pernah berpikir saya akan diserang oleh goblin dalam hidupku! Aku berhasil mencapai kota dan memeriksa statusku di Guild Petualang, hanya untuk menemukan bahwa kecepatanku tinggi. Selanjutnya, nama dari skill yang kumiliki adalah "Jack of all trades, master of none"...?
description.ja:
**小説家になろう発!!　異世界最速!? 神速と万能スキルを持つ異世界転移者のファンタジー、開幕!!**

**「異世界に来た僕は器用貧乏で素早さ頼りな旅をする｣
異世界転移した転移者の素早さ極振りの楽勝ライフが漫画に！**
 
 
アルバイト中に強盗に襲われた僕、上代朝霧。次に目を覚ましたのは、異世界だった。空腹に耐えられず、ひとまず向かった森でゴブリンに遭遇。しかし、なぜだか上手く武器を使え、撃退に成功する!!

　その後も狼に追われたりしつつも、何とか町へと到着。そこでギルドに加入し、依頼をこなしていたら、素早さの数値が異常に上昇していることが発覚!!だから、僕はこの素早さと器用(貧乏)さを武器に、この世界で生きることを決めるのだが――

　異世界最速の転生者が駆け抜けるファンタジーライフ、開幕!!
description.pt-br: Tarde da noite, no meio do meu trabalho de meio período em uma loja de conveniência, tive um encontro com um ladrão e fui impiedosamente morto a facadas. Quando estava prestes a perder minha consciência, pensei o quanto eu queria fazer isso e aquilo quando ouvi uma voz... 'O desejo de ser convocado foi confirmado. Concedendo habilidade única. 'Valete para toda obra, Mestre de ninguém.'' Palavras rudes como essas foram ditas.  Jack de todos os comércios, mestre de ninguém? Não mexa comigo! Esses pensamentos e desejos foram em vão quando minha consciência se desvaneceu, quando eu acordei estava em uma colina verde e nevoenta.

The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. description.en: Nogawa Izumi is a good student, and a class representative, but she has an increasingly high libido. It's gotten to the point that she'll claim to feel bad during class, so she can run to the nurse's office and masturbate. When she learns that the Earth is being invaded by aliens that look like people dressed up as animals, it turns out her high sex drive may be able to help protect the Earth. The first time Izumi is attacked by the aliens, she is rescued by Usayama, a bunny alien whose race was their previous victim. Usayama gives her an outfit (a sexy swimsuit) that will allow her to fight the aliens, but which also sends her constant arousal through the roof. The scientific organization that Usayama is affiliated with think that Izumi, with her high erotic level, may be the person they've been looking for to fight the aliens. Will Izumi be able to save the Earth?

There, he stumbles upon Kaito Kiriyama, a boy shrouded by terrifying spirits. With a serious look in his eyes, Kaito vows he'll protect Yuuma. But the moment their skin makes contact, the spirits surrounding Kaito started to possess Yuuma!

The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
description.pl: Najłatwiejszym sposobem zjednoczenia się różnorodnych jednostek, które tworzą społeczeństwo, jest znalezienie wspólnego wroga. Szkoła jest mini społeczeństwem, więc czy to samo nie powinno odbywać się w klasie? Ta konkretna klasa wybrała na wspólnego wroga Xu Shanga. Ale wkrótce jeden z najpopularniejszych uczniów w szkole staje się zaintrygowany specyficznym życiem Shanga.

Jaekyung, 'the son of a chaebol group who acts as a hobby' , can't forget the boy in his memory who keeps appearing in his dreams and disturbing his mind after meeting him once three years ago.

One day, I stopped by my cousin Tae-ha's office and encountered the boy swallowing Tae-ha's place (giving blowjob).
Suhyeon, a member of the popular idol group 'Midnight', said he was living on a sponsorship basis, so I went to him and said, "It doesn't matter what I do with anyone."
Jaekyung is engulfed in the urge to shake him up.
description.fr:
Seo Jaegyeong est un chaebol d’un riche groupe, et agit au gré de ses envies. Il ne peut néanmoins pas oublier ce garçon qu’il a rencontré il y a 3 ans de cela et qui continue d’apparaître dans ses rêves. En passant par le bureau de son cousin, Tae-Ha, il fait la ‘’rencontre’’ d’un membre du groupe Midnight, Su Hyeon, qui était en train de lui faire une petite faveur. Il déclare que celui-ci est son sponsor et qu’il agit en conséquence.
Seo Jaegyeong, choqué par ce qu’il se passe, est submergé par l’envie de le secouer.
	
Ndt : Lorsqu’un artiste dans le monde du spectacle, souhaite obtenir de gros rôles ou contrats, il tente de trouver un sponsor qui les trouvera pour lui, en échange de "faveurs" généralement sexuelles.

description.en:
My wicked mother brought a girl one day, the Duke's lost daughter, Loretta - the heroine of a novel called *The Duke's Four Children*. And I am Melody, the villainess in said novel who was punished alongside my mother for harassing the Duke's precious little girl. I didn’t want to die like that, so I decided to treat her well. I fed Loretta, put her to sleep, and played with her. And then her response was…?

"I hope Melody marries Loretta!"

Through her endless affection, I ended up coming back with her to the Duke's mansion, where she said "I'll stick close to Melody!"

Has there ever been anyone who is such a 'fool for Melody?!' Why am I being loved when I've only been kind to be able to live peacefully…!

---
When Melody discovers she's a villainess in someone else's story, being a slave dealer's daughter only adds to her guilty conscience. After her mother kidnaps Loretta, Duke Baldwin's long-lost child, Melody tries to comfort the scared little girl and forms a sisterly bond with her. So when the duke finds them, he takes both of them home because now they're inseparable! As the rest of House Baldwin becomes enamored with Melody's warm heart, will she ever learn that she deserves to be loved too?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD-%EC%86%8C%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EB%B0%9B%EA%B8%B0%EA%B0%80-%EB%B6%80%EB%81%84%EB%9F%AC%EC%9B%8C%EC%9A%94/3321), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61192421)
description.fr:
Ma méchante mère a amené une fille un jour.
C'était la fille cachée du duc, Loretta, l'héroïne des [Quatre enfants du duc].
Je suis Melody, la méchante qui a été punie par ma mère pour l'avoir harcelée.
Je ne veux pas mourir comme ça, alors je dois bien la traiter maintenant.
J'ai nourri Loretta, je l'ai endormie et j'ai joué avec elle.
Et puis sa réponse a été...
"J'espère que Melody épousera Loretta !"
Le déluge d'affection sans fin m'a conduit à la rejoindre auprès du duc et elle a dit : "Je vais rester près de Mlle Melody."
Avez-vous rencontré quelqu'un qui soit un "fou de Melody" plus qu'elle ?
Pourquoi suis-je aimée alors que j'ai seulement été assez gentille pour me faire vivre paisiblement.... !
